Package com.team3.game.characters.ai

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Ability
    Ability class that defines, chooses and sets properties of abilities for the player and enemy.
    AiCharacter
    AI Character object for the game.
    Enemy
    Creates enemy and sets them to sabotage systems.
    EnemyManager
    Manage enemies in the game.
    Npc
    Initializes an npc object.
    NpcManager
    manage npcs in the game.
